DOC.brief_summary: To establish efficacy Lu AE58054 adjunctive therapy donepezil symptomatic treatment patient mild-to-moderate Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Lu AE58054 Patients With Mild - Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease Treated With Donepezil
